website_summaries.verdict: Everything is more fun with a friend. Your child will love learning to swim with this dolphin kickboard from Melissa and Doug.
pros: Styrofoam board with colorful polyester casing
Colorfast fabric withstands chlorine and sun exposure
Helps develop gross motor skills and confidence in the water
cons: Fabric stains and shifts relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: great at first, but not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: purchased this item on June 11, 2018 (only 4 months ago) and the board is already falling apart. I also bought the shark board at the same time, which is just fine, but this is disappointing. my daughters (both age 6/under) probably only used the board less than a handful of times. next time i'll buy one of those boards they have at public pools/lessons instead.
customer_reviews.author: lastylemaven

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug disapppointed us for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Cover over board started bubbling after first swim. Now, 2 weeks later it looks like it's falling apart. Shame on me for going with a cheaper option, but not something I expected from Melissa and Doug as we buy a lot of stuff from them and have never had a problem before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Styrofoam Covered in Fabric
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of styrofoam covered in fabric. Received this with a small dent in the side as it is easy to dent styrofoam. It may not last very long if your kids are rowdy. We took it to the pool yesterday and it worked great. My granddaughter is six years old and is still learning to swim. This helped her to work on kicking.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kickboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to help daughter learn swimming - she swims fine now and still loves to use the kickboard to play around in the pool - I was unsure about the fabric cover but it has held up remarkably well - keeps the foam inside covered and protected from scuffs and damage so I think it will last way beyond her childhood. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amdroid007

customer_reviews.title: Great buying experience all around! Rec'd quickly which always makes me happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old granddaughter loved it and all the other kids at the kiddie pool did too because they kept trying to trade their toy with hers, making her very popular! She will need to get her kick under control to really use it properly, but she had fun trying. The cute purple dolphin face is not printed on the board, but it is wrapped on tightly and I hope it will stay on with the tough use it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Casa

customer_reviews.title: surviving the salt water pool
customer_reviews.text: The bright purple color was a big hit. So far it has survived the salt water pool and Arizona sun. More importantly though it keeps a little on up when she needs a break from swimming and also when she wants to just cruise around kicking her feet. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great swimming helper for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are learning to swim and their swimming instructor uses a kickboard with them to teach them proper technique. So I decided to purchase one just like hers so that I can practice at home home with them. It serves the main purpose which is to give the child something to hold on to as they learn to kick with their legs. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely as cute as can be
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely as cute as can be just don’t know how durable it will be to stand up to rough kids use , styrofoam covered with a sewn clothe material
customer_reviews.author: Mabuhay Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Holding Up
customer_reviews.text: No bad offgassing smell and so far has stayed together being outside in direct sun for the past two months.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. West

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but hard foam
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this would be a softer foam material, but it's hard foam. Just fyi. Works as it should, but probably not great when kids want to be kids and let them launch up from under the water.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This is well built and the graphic looks nice. It is easy to grip the edges
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and the graphic looks nice. It is easy to grip the edges, which is good for new swimmers. It is definitely not for an adult, but the perfect size and feel for a child. Exactly what I would expect from Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.author: R. G. WilsonTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Cute kickboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised to see people complain that these are small and fragile. My husband and I were playing around with them. They are definitely not fragile. Size wise they are meant for kids. Kids can't hold onto something huge. My daughters who are 4 were playing with these just fine. I wouldn't want them any bigger. And the design is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. It had wooden splinters embedded in the board, the “dolphin face material has separated from the rest of the board, and the stitching is coming apart. I usually LOVE Melissa and Doug products but this is something I will not let my grandchildren use!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S. Belson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and handy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kick board. I ordered it to help me teach my 3 year old how to swim. She has been using it to float on and also learning how to kick around the pool. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marieke

customer_reviews.title: Great board, despite odd dolphin.
customer_reviews.text: The dolphin is kind of an odd picture on the board, but it was cheap and it's well made. Children ask my daughter what it is at the pool all the time, and she usually has to point out that it's a dolphin. I'm not docking it any stars, but I probably would have spent a little more money to get a cuter board.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toy Pomeranian. He has a life persevere vest. But sometimes he likes to float around in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really liked this board to use in the pool, only wished it had straps for her to hold
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This kickboard is very cute and held up well during our week-long beach vacation -- including being packed in a checked suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Umwari

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves using this. Not as durable as I wished it was. I wore a little on first use, but still good value for the money and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged not the same quality you expect from Melissa and Doug products would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: A.I. Vere

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should :)
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that it might be slippery or hard to hold but my 2 year old does very well with it. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cool kids kickboard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter teaches swim lessons and needed a kick board. Her younger students love using this playful one!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Works well, on dry land and in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old uses this for surfing in the living room, great for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but ripped immediately right down the front of the board after opening. My daughter was just walking around the house with it for maybe 5 minutes before it ripped ☹️. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would provide more buoyancy for my three year ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would provide more buoyancy for my three year old. After one week, the cover has started to separate from the foam. Not high quality, but not expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: OCD_OBD

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Purchased for my 6 year old niece who is improving her swimming!
customer_reviews.author: K Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fun perfect size for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love going swimming with this and that they have an animal on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sho

customer_reviews.title: Helped my two year old learn to swim without fear
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the sturdiness and how well my daughter gravitates to it. She quickly learned what to do with it and by the end of the summer was swimming in just a puddle jumper across the pool. Supervised of course.
customer_reviews.author: Cari G.

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, durable product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 6 year old! Great for leisure floating and learning to swim. Suggest to anyone teaching their kids to kick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great board, my son loves it, and it is made with sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the money. Just took forever to get them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but bad packaging that ruined the front.
customer_reviews.text: So cute, but I've had this in my possession about 3 min and it's already ruined due to bad packaging. There's a sticker on the front that must be removed, but to do so causes the fabric cover to separate from the styrofoam backing. Keeping it because my kid has a swim lesson tomorrow, but totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JBNLA

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved playing with this in the pool this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter approves
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who just started swimming without her puddle jumper. It’s easy for her to use. And its cute!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Dawn Meddings

customer_reviews.title: This is so-so
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for the price. Seems a little small and somewhat flimsy. So far we haven’t had much of a chance to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and even holds up my husband. Great for kids learning to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Sarbear0814

customer_reviews.title: very cute kickboard and works well. Hasn't faded yet ...
customer_reviews.text: very cute kickboard and works well. Hasn't faded yet and has been in the sun multiple times. There is an exterior fabric around the foam core, so it does slide around and pucker a little. That doesn't detract from how well it works though--just the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Child Loves This Board
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was about 10 times happier in the pool with the board to kick with than without it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Does the job - my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This floatie is perfect for my 2.5 year old. It is durable and she easy for her to use as she practices leg kicking in swim sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So cute, just like all of the Sunny Patch collection
customer_reviews.text: So cute, just like all of the Sunny Patch collection
customer_reviews.author: inastrol

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Cute, did end up returning it though we found a much cheaper one at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dibben

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My four year old grandson was coming to visit and we live near a small swimming lake. He just finished beginning swimming lessons and this board was perfect for him to practice and show us what he had learned. Cute graphic, floats as expected and he loved it. Please remember this is a toy and not a flotation device so adult supervision at all times. Fun purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KMMT

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: My 3-y/o granddaughter is getting plenty of good use out of this. It's good quality and will likely hold up for several years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Curtman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old loves using this to learn how to swim
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Earley

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boards and after only 3-4 uses, one of them is falling apart. The inside foam is distorted and the cover is coming apart. NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Lee

customer_reviews.title: Adequate not great
customer_reviews.text: Color was true. Not as bouyant as I'd expect, and my duaghter is on the small side for her age (~30 pounds). The dolphin design is on a fabric like material. Not sure how long that will last. I would not purchase if I had another chance. I don't feel I got ripped off. It was reasonably affordable. It is okay for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael

customer_reviews.title: Swim Kickboard
customer_reviews.text: It has a rather flimsy cloth covering. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Little styrofoam beads are wearing off despite only using the kickboard a handful of times. It's fine -- my daughter still uses it. I just question the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This product a complete disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. First time used in the water with a 3yo, the outside lining pulled away from board. The stability is awful - no float capacity even with smallest child. Melissa and Doug blew it on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb A Soholt

customer_reviews.title: Good kick-board for working with young swimmers.
customer_reviews.text: Three of these were a big hit this past summer. Great kick-board for teaching young swimmers, under direct adult supervision. The fabriccovering seems a bit flimsy. We'll see how well they hold up in storage for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kickboard for a toddler - little kid
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Smaller than expected but I probably didn't read the dimensions. Good kickboard for a toddler - little kid.
customer_reviews.author: EmG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wave
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it is very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these we bring them to the pool everyday. I love the material its soft not hard and rough. great for little ones to get more comfortable in the water with adult supervision of course.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter to use in her wading pool and it's just the right size for a small 4 year old child. It's surprisingly buoyant and though it will probably only last one season, it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: kathy from MI

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, it's cheap fabric over cheap foam and feels like it could rip with slight force. But for a toddler, it's cute and will probably last a season or two before said toddler graduates to swimming on their own.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and practical for learning to swim, all at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Shy

customer_reviews.title: We were expecting a small size kickboard like at her (previous) kids pool
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kickboard because the regular kickboard at the pool was too big. We were expecting a small size kickboard like at her (previous) kids pool. My daughter loved the color/print, but it seems 'full-size'.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for 5 year old, but fabirc covering not taught
customer_reviews.text: This is a styrafoam kickboard covered with fabric. The fabric is not tight over the board, so it wrinkles easily - especially when wet. It is a very good size and shape for a 5 year old to hold and learn to kick.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kickboard, but probably best for older kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 2-year-old to use in her swim lessons and she is obsessed with it. I think it is a great kickboard - it is really cute and she loves it, but it is a little big for her so I think it is probably better suited for older/bigger kids.
customer_reviews.author: baumse

customer_reviews.title: Durable children's kickboard
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this board. it's a great size for her at 2 years and very durable. As others have said, the covering of the board is fabric and can slip or wrinkle a bit when wet, but it seems to resolve once dry.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but I was hoping the board would not be covered in material.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time - all in one piece. The only odd thing is that in packaging, tape was used to secure paper show piece to the board and now the cute purple cover is stretched and discolored where the tape was removed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 3 yr old to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old to use at the public pool and she LOVES IT!! She doesn't use it as a kickboard yet, more as a float. It's cute.
customer_reviews.author: No More Bad Service

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great next step before the kiddos learn to swim. Helps build confidence and endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this paddle board for my daughter that is delayed. We used it for a swim therapy session to help build her strength. This board was just the right size for the exercises she needs to do. It was a great price as well and a fun design for her to look at while working hard.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. For the price it suits my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. For the price it suits my needs as a place to put my coffe cup in the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kick board to teach private swim lessons to a beginner. Love the position of the flippers and the eyes. Depending on what we are working on, I can direct my swimmer to place the hands on the eyes or the flippers:) Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Little Ms Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great for little swimmers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board. The kids love it both in and out of the water. The character face has brought the board to the party as an additional pool "toy" and not just a floatie option.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: they like it so much
customer_reviews.text: My kids fight over this kickboard, they like it so much. I should have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Mom32

customer_reviews.title: Small - Small - Small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to look at the Dimensions before you purchase this kickboard. It is VERY small and fragile. I can't see this product lasting more than a few sessions in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Gulf Coast Baby, Beach & Bike Rentals, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, ordered these for a class at work and the suited our needs just fine. I would order these again but they wouldn't last long under full time pool use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i expected and on time. My son is in swim lessons and needed something to help with his kicks and this worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: monique jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great, is safe, and very cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old really enjoys her new kick board. it works great and I feel that it is a great product for new swimmers. Would definitely buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama2Little1's

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and lovebthe design. However, after i purchase i found swim boards at Five Below for $3.00. Inwould suggest getting it at that store if you can.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for a teaching tool for my 2 1/2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for a teaching tool for my 2 1/2 year old, would be much better if it had the built in handles.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute kickboard for our 4 year old learning to swim. She likes the purple.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very, Very small for the price. It was not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful pool toy
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my daughter to learn to balance in the swimming pool. Never leave them unattended because it stable. Great product. Vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: A pool must for kids...
customer_reviews.text: Great little "floater. Its a bit fragile and breaks, but still stays together.
customer_reviews.author: V.  P. Spasic

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it for the lake and pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kickboard
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and granddaughter are very happy with the kickboard and are sharing it in the pool whenever they have a chance to go swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size and color is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is almost 5. She loves it and it is easy for her to hold onto. The colors are almost identical to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old and her friends all love these kickboards :) They are ages six up to ten. We have a small 30 inch intex metal frame pool and they are perfect in there for practicing swimming skills! Very cute and durable too!
customer_reviews.author: melissadg

customer_reviews.title: Swimmy
customer_reviews.text: A little wrinkled on the material itself but overall an awesome first board for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: rusman1

customer_reviews.title: Its cute and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and cheap. I like it totally. I have to write atleast 20 words for this review to get published.. So.. ITS purple, girly, and awesome !
customer_reviews.author: rohi

customer_reviews.title: Dolphin Swim Board
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great for small kids, not boys. It floats well, but not durable. Lasted one summer. Debra
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a four year old
customer_reviews.text: We just had a vacation in Florida with 2 Grandchildren and I ordered a bunch of stuff to be delivered the day after I arrived. It all came right on time and it was great fun to open a box of pool toys I didn't have to spend time running around buying. This is a little kick board to encourage my Grandson who is 4 to try swimming with. he was very proud of how he could kick around the pool with this.
customer_reviews.author: Marla M

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews but decided to go along with my purchase anyways because I love Melissa & Doug. Now I wish I hadn't!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright purple, especially in the water, easy to see, one of a kind! Eight size for mt 4 yr old and 6 yr! Especially the price was right!!!
customer_reviews.author: elisem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 years and
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted! Perfect for 2 years and up
customer_reviews.author: Uno Dos

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. My daughter is a big fan of this kickboard and we also took it on two trips. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Chan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kick board for toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this. Will help her with kicks and build confidence in pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cmod

customer_reviews.title: We were not happy with the quality Its a little smaller then other ...
customer_reviews.text: We were not happy with the quality Its a little smaller then other boogie boards for small kids and the purple color coating is pealing off and bubbling up after being left outside. Not a great product, which is surprising since Melissa and Doug make such wonderful kids products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, but dangerous if you’re not sure how to use it. My 4 year old granddaughter has tried to use it and it has come up out of the water many times to smack her in the face or throat hit her. Its now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Trina  Peddicord

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Dart Dolphin Kickboard
product_meta.description:
Young swimmers will be motivated to zip through the water with Dart Dolphin's help! Beginners can hold onto this tough, fabric-coated kickboard as they gain confidence; older swimmers will love using it for games and exercise.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: A colorful kickboard to help children learn to swim
Styrofoam board with colorful polyester casing
Colorfast fabric withstands chlorine and sun exposure.
Dart Dolphin character adds a splash of whimsy.
Perfect for developing gross motor skills and confidence in the pool!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars487 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
